de.iabg.swing
Class DrawingPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  de.iabg.swing.DrawingPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderer, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class DrawingPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements Renderer

This implementation of Renderer merges Swing and Java3D into one standard component. This class does not deal directly with Java3D, but wraps most of the methods from DrawingCanvas3D. Therefore, this component can focus on the Swing side of this integrated JPanel and simply add the DrawingCanvas3D as a component like any other. This allows the user to simply work with this DrawingPanel since it completely wraps DrawingCanvas3D. This DrawingPanel itself has another capability aside from those declared in Renderer. It has the possibility to change its background color determined by a listener and if all Renderable scenes correctly render the background color.

Version:
September 10, 2008
Author:
Adam C. Dick, BSE
See Also:
Serialized Form
